channel.title: Hello on Ningxin Su
channel.description: Recent content in Hello on Ningxin Su

item.title: About
item.description: Ningxin Su is currently a third-year Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Engineering group, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Toronto. She received her M.E. Degree and B.E. Degree from The University of Sheffield and Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2020 and 2019, respectively. Introducing Ningxin – a versatile individual with a passion for the arts and a thirst for knowledge. From conducting in a large choir, to drumming in a rock band, and teaching dance, she is a true lover of music and movement.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Refereed Conference Papers Ningxin Su, Baochun Li. “Asynchronous Federated Unlearning,” in the Proceedings of IEEE INFOCOM 2023, New York Area, U.S.A., May 17-20, 2023. Ningxin Su, Baochun Li. “How Asynchronous can Federated Learning Be?” in the Proceedings of the 30th IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Quality of Service (IWQoS 2022), Online, June 10 — 12, 2022.
